page.title: 08FIONA'S DAY ELDWICK&GILSTEAD
page.content: On Fridays{I get up at 7o'clock,}go into the bathroom,see Daddy,have a wash and get ready.After breakfast we all take Mummy a cup of tea.Everyone is up by a quarter past eight and I {get ready for school}.I check that I have my recorder and my library book. We go to school by car as it is quite a long way.{In the classroom}I sit on the mat and read until Mr Mirfield gives a list of{jobs to be done.}I get on with my work then have our morning {playtime}.I play skipping with my friends.After more work it is{12oclock {lunchtime}.All afternoon{I do maths or {writing,read or make something.}We all then listen to a story (Mr Browser). We go{home at quarter past three}with Mum by car.I play for a while then at {5.15 I go to my modern and tap dance class, go home,have tea and{go to bed {at 8o'clock,}read my book,then sleep.
